Title: Open Asset Import Library ("assimp"): Multiple Vulnerabilities
Synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Open Asset Import Library, the worst of which could result in denial of service.

Background.Text: Open Asset Import Library is a library to import and export various 3d-model-formats including scene-post-processing to generate missing render data.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Fetchmail, the worst of which could result in email disclosure to third parties.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Open Asset Import Library users should upgrade to the latest version:
